#summary How to build this project.

= Requirements =

  * Ruby
  * [http://rake.rubyforge.org/ Rake]

= Building =

Run `rake` in the project's root folder.

= Outputs =

  * user.js scripts for The Movide Dude and The Game Dude in the _fill this in_ folder.
  * A tarball of the entire project in the `dist` folder.

= Acknowledgments =

This project cribbed its build system from [http://www.prototypejs.org/ Prototype].
